text: (Yastō kina) ki jaba timīlā'ī ē'uṭā kaṣṭa di'iyō, jabaki yasakō du'ī–guṇā kaṣṭa timrō hātabāṭa tinīharūmāthi parisakēkō thiyō, ta timīharū bhannathālyau ki yastō saṅkaṭa kahām̐bāṭa ā'iparyō?. Tapā'ī bhanidinus ki yō timīharūkai tarphabāṭa ā'ipugēkō hō. Niḥsandēha allāha sampūrṇa kurāharūmāthi sārmathya rākhdacha
